content.text: Vulvar cancer usually forms slowly over years, most often on the vaginal lips or the sides of the vaginal opening.  Infection with human papillomavirus (HPV) causes about half of all vulvar cancers. Explore the links on this page to learn more about vulvar cancer treatment, statistics, research, and clinical trials.
The information in this section is meant to help you cope with the many issues and concerns that occur when you have cancer.
Gardasil 9 Vaccine Protects against Additional HPV Types
